item.title: All 3 Venom Movies Ranked
item.description: Venom: The Last Dance concluded Tom Hardy’s Venom trilogy in triumphant style, but the trilogy as a whole has certainly had its ups and downs.

item.title: 10 Things From Michael Keaton's Batman Movies That Have Aged Poorly
item.description: Michael Keaton's Batman is still one of the all-time great superhero movie performances, but it's hard to pretend that his films don't have flaws.

item.title: Havoc Rotten Tomatoes Revealed – How Does It Compare To Past Tom Hardy Movies
item.description: The Rotten Tomatoes score for Havoc starring Tom Hardy is now here as the action movie from The Raid director Gareth Evans lands on Netflix.
